This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability

2010801679.name: Ambitious Assassin

2019952880.name: Serve the Colony

2039302152.name: Slideways

2054312700.description:

2108556049.name: Lightweight Frame
2108556049.description: Recurve bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped. Press  while drawn to cancel the shot.

2117683199.name: Full Auto Trigger System

2121086290.name: Rat Pack

2130042297.name: Taken Predator

2154191829.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft
2154191829.description:
Light and stable shaft material.

2179934441.name: MIDA Synergy

2186532310.name: Poison Arrows

Powerful scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

Strong optics. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range

2209280306.description:

2213355989.name: High-Impact Reserves

2238035098.name: Storm and Stress

2250482732.name: Prometheus Catalyst

2273483223.name: Solar Damage Mod

2285418970.name: Tracker Disabled

2381230784.name: Graviton Lance Catalyst

2383960413.name: Cruel Remedy

2551157718.name: Box Breathing

2590365289.name: Together Forever

2590710093.name: Tireless Blade

2673643645.description: Found in strikes against the most challenging opponents.

2680121939.description:
Strong battery life.

2848615171.name: Dragonfly

2869569095.name: Field Prep

2942552113.description: Maximized stats. Generates Orbs on multikills. Fitted with a kill tracker.

3020272562.name: Fighting Lion Catalyst

3032599245.name: Blinding Grenades

3047969693.name: Desperado

3056315074.name: Sweet Business Catalyst

3081173348.name: The Fundamentals
3081173348.description: Holding  changes this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

3081867624.name: Master of Arms

3096702027.name: Genesis

3617228241.name: Sunshot Catalyst
3617228241.description: Found by pledging to the followers of war.

3642491337.name: Tesseract
